alert.note: Alert for Kootenai, Cabinet Region; Lower Clark Fork Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:19PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lincoln and northwestern Sanders Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 718 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles south of Noxon, or 19 miles northeast of Osburn, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Noxon, Trout Creek and Tuscor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Kootenai, Cabinet Region; Lower Clark Fork Region
